bug.author: rabbit008
bug.summary: [V1.0 bug-bash]Error returning information when resume experiment that has been done
bug.description:
: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28092647/62749502-414a7880-ba8f-11e9-8793-a31f67e406a1.png></denchmark-link>
when I use nnictl resume experiment_id to resume an experiment which status is done, it will show that the experiment is running. : Run the experiment normally according to the official example. How to reproduce it: windows+local+an experiment that has been done+nnictl resume experiment_id nni Environment:
nni version:1.0 nni mode(local|pai|remote):local OS:win python version:3.7 is conda or virtualenv used?: no is running in docker?:no
need to update document(yes/no): Anything else we need to know:

comments.comment: info change to "only stopped experiment can be resumed"
